Analyzing Experts; Ethics and Safety

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 pm Pacific Time.

In this week's webinar, we will discuss the STRICTA reporting guidelines for acupuncture trials, we will discuss research in the media, qualities to look for in experts, evaluating safety in supplements, and how to help our patient navigate research in the media. Our stats chat will introduce the concept of numbers needed to treat (NNT).

During the webinar, you will complete the In Class Exercise #7 "Experts checklist". Please download the worksheet before class.

Due this week:

  • Incorporating EIP into courses and clinic
  • Moderator teams submit final questions

Due next week:

  • MYMOP follow up
  • Due August 1st before class - Affirmative & Negative teams complete responses to debate questions in Discussion Forum #3 - Debate (Group Collaboration Space)

Preparation for next week:

  • Case Study
  • Debate Prep Reading
